story.author: Pamphila Brandybuck
story.headline: Apple Launches iFurniture
story.subheading: It's here, it's new, it's smart. It's all you wanted (maybe)!

article.p: Today was a historic day for Apple, the famous smartphone and computer company. During their conference, "The world of tomorrow, today", they announced their investment in the furniture industry, and launched the first line of iFurniture.
The range includes the following: iDesk (£1500), iSwivel (£700), iLamp (£350), iCouch (£1900), iTable (£3500), iChair (£450), iBed (£2000), iWardrobe (£2200)

While the prices might seem quite spicy, attendants to the event expressed their excitement at the products announced. The general feedback was that Apple, once again, has set a standard of quality and beauty, while undertaking a risky venture in a new domain.
The range will be available in stores at the end of next month.
Please follow us closely as we will be reviewing the much expected range!
